Lde/ecspride/MainService;->onStartComman: The onStartCommand method retrieves the SIM serial number via TelephonyManager and stores it in the 'secret' field of MainService. This could potentially expose sensitive data if the field is accessed without proper security measures.
Lde/ecspride/MainService;->onLowMemory:(: The onLowMemory method uses the 'secret' field (containing SIM serial number) as part of an SMS send operation, potentially leaking sensitive data via SMS.
